ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CZ_Lead', OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), NOT(REGEX(Phone, "^([+]420|[+]421)[0-9]{9}$")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "^([+]420|[+]421)[0-9]{9}$")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Other_Phone__c)), NOT(REGEX(Other_Phone__c, "^([+]420|[+]421)[0-9]{9}$")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone should start with +420 or +421 and be followed by 9 digits, without spaces.
